version_description: Bug fixes.

- All matches in a campaign location are available to play when the location is unlocked.
- Fixed incorrect match scores.
- Fixed match eligibility date thresholds, e.g. a match requires 1980's cars but incorrectly disallows cars from 1980 or 1989.

New track variants, Temperate, Alpine and Hot.
Earn gold and a bonus gift by watching ads.
More car prizes added to UK 1 and France 1.
Prize board now shows the highest rarity car prize remaining.
Match panels now show the highest rarity car prize remaining.
Tap to skip the 3D race to the finishing line.
Players hand saved between sessions.
Added tyre tips to the challenge screen.
Helpshift moved to the options screen.
Sound FX.
Music

Bug fix for loaded race tracks not being correct.
Bug fix for a crash in Help and Support.
My Cars added to the home screen.

Suzuki is coming to Top Drives! Hot hatches, off-roaders and the completely crazy Pikes Peak XL7 - a strong contender for 'fastest car in the game'.

Put your cars through their paces in a brand new Tokyo environment.

Changes to multiplayer events mean you now get to choose your opponent. Don't fancy your chances? Then simply skip to the next challenger.

Lots of small fixes and improvements.

Please keep the feedback coming. We've got some big new features coming this year and also some very exciting new manufacturers joining the line up - check out our Facebook page or forums to keep up to date.

It's the update you've been waiting for. Porsche is hitting Top Drives in a big way with over 80 models to collect! From the brand's early days with the stunning 356 Speedster all the way up to ballistic SUVs and iconic hypercars such as the 911 GT1 and 918 Spyder. We'll be running Porsche themed events throughout December, giving you the chance to win some of the most desirable cars in the world.

Our forums are now accessible in-game (look for the new button in the top bar in main menus). We want to make it easier for you to discuss the game and for us to share the latest news.

Thanks for the incredible support for Top Drives. Amazing to see the epic battles in events and strategic discussions on the forums. Rest assured that we're working flat out on the game. New features and manufacturers to be announced soon!

In addition to Porsche, we're introducing a major new game mode in the form of live Challenge Ladders. Battle your way up a ladder of opponents to claim the prizes before time runs out.

- ‘Best of British’ update to celebrate London Games Festival.
- Iconic models from MG, Rover and Austin, including the unhinged Metro 6R4.
- Seven new McLarens for our legendary players.
- Brand new daily reward feature so even more reason to come back every day!
- Daily reward v2 brings exciting enhancements.
- New filter functionality makes it easier to search your car collection.
- Lots of little bug fixes.
- Keep on collecting! New manufacturers and race environments coming soon.

Two iconic British manufacturers in one update! Jaguar brings everything from the stunning XKSS historic racer and beautiful E-Type to the brutal Project 8. Land Rover gives you some brilliant new options in those tricky off-road races. Find the mighty Range Rover Sport SVR in a pack and you'll basically be unstoppable.

We're also unveiling the brand new Canyon environment with a mix of on and off-road races. Look out for it in Events and Challenges soon.

Please keep your feedback coming. Lots of exciting things in the pipeline but let us know what features you want to see added to the game. Happy racing!

- Join one of three prestigious racing clubs and compete in Club Events against players all across the world!
- This release contains bug fixes and some optimisation work.

- Travel and experience the legend of Green Hell, with the officially licensed Nürburgring Nordschleife, featuring brand new racing challenges!
- More than 200 new German cars have been added featuring RUF, Volkswagen, and BMW!
- Hand autosaving - Individual events now remember the last hand you played, so you can switch between events much more easily.
- More types of notifications have been added to the game, along with a Notification Manager to help customise which notifications you see

- Hill Climb bugs fixed
- Various other bug fixes

- Vive la France! Start collecting some of the world's greatest hot hatches with the arrival of Peugeot.
- Over 50 new models as part of the new French Renaissance set, including Citroen and Bugatti!
- Over 90 new American Dream cars, introducing Pontiac and featuring new models from Dodge, GMC and more.
- Top Drives has more licensed cars than any other game with over 1250 models!

- Travel to the land of the free and explore the city of Santa Monica, a new environment with brand new challenges!
- More than 80 new American cars have been added featuring Dodge, Chrysler and many more!
- Collect the Challenger SRT Demon and Viper ACR!
- You can now lock cards to ensure you don't fuse them!

The RQ Revolution is here. Car RQ is changing from a max of 30 to a max of 100 to give more granularity in the RQ of different models. Players' Max RQ is automatically changing, too, increasing to a maximum of 500 for top level players.

- Race in a number of Challenge-based single player game modes rolling out over the coming weeks
